mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_recharge_record where user_no = #{userNo} and MONTH(create_time) = #{mouth} AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{lastTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{beforeTime},'%Y-%m-%d') Order BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') desc ;

SELECT
MONTH(create_time) months FROM user_recharge_record where user_no = #{userNo} AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{lastTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{beforeTime},'%Y-%m-%d') group BY months desc;
